I really like word games. I wrote code to generate personalized mini’s (a great gift!!), a Chrome extension to track your NYTimes crossword stats, a solver for the game WordBrain, and code to visualize your Facebook message history with someone. All this is to say I like word-game adjacent projects! Below is a set of minis I’ve made. I really like making them for people, so reach out if you’d like a something themed ☀️

  • [4.09.2020] crossword mini
  • [4.09.2020] crossword mini
  • [7.15.2017] spelling bee
  • [7.01.2017] crossword mini
